(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Advertorial))
    (VP (VBD Did)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP know)
            (SBAR (IN that)
              (S
                (NP (NNP Earth) (NNP Day))
                (VP (VBD was)
                  (VP (VBN founded)
                    (ADVP
                      (NP (CD 40) (NNS years))
                      (RB ago))))))))))
    (. ?)))


nsubj(Did-2, Advertorial-1)
root(ROOT-0, Did-2)
nsubj(know-4, you-3)
ccomp(Did-2, know-4)
mark(founded-9, that-5)
nn(Day-7, Earth-6)
nsubjpass(founded-9, Day-7)
auxpass(founded-9, was-8)
ccomp(know-4, founded-9)
num(years-11, 40-10)
npadvmod(ago-12, years-11)
advmod(founded-9, ago-12)

    (NP (PRP I))

        (S
          (NP (PRP it))

              (NP (DT a) (JJ recent) (NN thing))
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP (NN response))))
            (PP (TO to)
              (NP (JJ global) (NN warming)
                (CC and)
                (NN climate) (NN change)))))))
    (. .)))

              (NP (PRP I))
              (VP (VBP have))
              (, ,))))))))

  (S
    (NP (DT the) (NN environment))

          (NP (DT the) (NN extent)))

            (NP (PRP we))

    (. .)))

  (S

cc(outside-5, or-6)
conj(outside-5, on-7)
det(sill-10, the-8)
nn(sill-10, window-9)
pobj(outside-5, sill-10)
advmod(teach-15, so-11)
mark(teach-15, that-12)
nsubj(teach-15, you-13)
aux(teach-15, can-14)
advcl(Create-1, teach-15)
poss(child-17, your-16)
dobj(teach-15, child-17)
aux(love-19, to-18)
infmod(child-17, love-19)
cc(love-19, and-20)
conj(love-19, appreciate-21)
dobj(love-19, nature-22)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX There))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (ADJP (JJ many)
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP
              (NP (JJR more) (NNS ideas))
              (PP (IN on)
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WP what))
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP you))
                    (VP (MD can)
                      (VP (VB do)
                        (PP (IN at)
                          (NP (DT the) (NNP Playhouse) (NNP Disney) (NN website)))))))))
            (ADVP (RB so))
            (VP (VBP do)
              (VP (VB log)
                (PRT (RP in))
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB learn)
                      (NP (JJR more)))))))))))
    (. !)))


expl(are-2, There-1)
root(ROOT-0, are-2)
acomp(are-2, many-3)
amod(ideas-5, more-4)
nsubj(log-18, ideas-5)
prep(ideas-5, on-6)
dobj(do-10, what-7)
nsubj(do-10, you-8)
aux(do-10, can-9)
pcomp(on-6, do-10)
prep(do-10, at-11)
det(website-15, the-12)
nn(website-15, Playhouse-13)
nn(website-15, Disney-14)
pobj(at-11, website-15)
advmod(log-18, so-16)
aux(log-18, do-17)
ccomp(many-3, log-18)
prt(log-18, in-19)
aux(learn-21, to-20)
xcomp(log-18, learn-21)
dobj(learn-21, more-22)
